function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through close contact, respiratory droplets, fomites, and contaminated surfaces","Impact":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 and increased public health concerns","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene practices, regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, and promoting social distancing measures","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection systems, and touchless technology for surfaces","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in crowded environments","Owner":"Government agencies, building management, and individuals"},{"Description":"Possibility of airborne transmission through airborne particles with diameters smaller than 5 \\\\u03bcm","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2, posing a significant threat to public health","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, using air purifiers equipped with HEPA filters, and promoting the use of face masks","Technologies":"HVAC systems with improved filtration, HEPA air purifiers, and portable air quality monitors","People":"General public, individuals in enclosed spaces, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Building management, healthcare facilities, and individuals"},{"Description":"Involvement of building environment and human behavior in the transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Facilitates the spread of COVID-19 within buildings and communities, leading to increased infection rates","Mitigation":"Promoting good indoor air quality, implementing ventilation improvements, and educating individuals on safe behaviors","Technologies":"Bi-polar ionization systems, CO2 sensors for ventilation control, and smart building management systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and individuals in communal spaces","Owner":"Facility management companies, building owners, and individuals"}]}
